channel.title: How do u make an owner zone?
channel.description: Can someone give me the instructions on making a co owner+ zone please any help will be good :D

ya or you could make it into a void and then make a portal which you click on that required 2-3 player rights, whichever u want

item.title: How do u make an owner zone?
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

You can make a command like:[code]
else if (command.startsWith("@@@") && playerRights >= 3)

        if (teleblock == true) {

            sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
        } else {

        teleportToX = &&&&;

        teleportToY = &&&&;

            sendMessage("You teleport to the Owner zone.");[/code]

&&&&= Your coords
@@@@= Your command

Or you can use a case.
like:[code]
case &&&&: // Co+ portal
if (playerRights == 3) {

                teleportToX = ****;

                teleportToY = ****;

                heightLevel = 0;

                sendMessage("You teleport to The Owners Zone");
        } else {
         sendMessage(

                            "You have to be Co-Owner+ to get in");

                }
                   break;

[/code]
&&&& = Object ID
**** = Coords

~Dark~

Read full topic

item.title: How do u make an owner zone?
item.dc:creator: @empir3z empir3z
item.description:
@empir3z wrote:

Copy the part for commands ::az then replace the playerRights > 0 to playerRights > 2 That 2 represents the rights so if you want it to be for everyone you would set it to 0 if you want mod and above you set it to 1 and if you want for admin you set 2 and so on but i suggest you edit the position of where you setting up or else it will be froze…

Read full topic
